recipes.title: Pumpkin Spice Sourdough Loaf
recipes.description: Moist and warmly spiced, this loaf captures the cozy flavors of autumn.

recipes.title: Apple Cinnamon Sourdough Rolls
recipes.description: Tender rolls swirled with cinnamon sugar and diced apples — perfect for fall mornings.

recipes.title: Maple Walnut Sourdough Bread
recipes.description: A hearty, nutty loaf sweetened with maple syrup — great with butter or cheese.
